item.title: Find, Take, Teach
item.description: Elder Quentin L. Cook outlined a new focus on finding a name, taking it to the temple, and teaching others to do the same.

item.title: RootsTech 2015: The Promised Blessings of Family History
item.description: This video has all the recent promises given by general authorities about doing family history work, and how it will bless our lives here and now, not just our deceased ancestors.

item.title: His Grace: Unplanned Pregnancy, Adoption and The “Best Gift Ever”
item.description: When Katie became a single mother following an unplanned pregnancy, she couldn’t have imagined the impact her adoption story would have on her faith and others’.

item.title: Finding Your Purpose in Life: Does Faith Matter?
item.description: Rich Miller grew up believing completely in the reality and importance of the gospel. But Rich left his faith behind to search for another kind of truth. He was surprised by what he found.

item.title: Seminary Centennial
item.description: Look back at the 100-year history of the seminary program of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Learn about the men who began the program, and gain insights into how it changes lives. today.

item.title: Sculpting the Prophet
item.description: Blair Buswell has sculpted just about anything you can imagine, but his most cherished work is the bust of Church President Thomas S. Monson. Hear what it was like to work with the prophet, and find out what he told Buswell upon completion.

item.title: A Look Back: The Logan Tabernacle
item.description: Utah historian Kenneth Godfrey shares insight into the historic Logan Tabernacle and gives us a peek at its beautiful pioneer craftsmanship.

item.title: Inspired by The Coat
item.description: See how "The Coat," a Mormon Channel video of an experience from the life of Heber J. Grant, inspired a group of girls to give service.

item.title: For God Did Send Me
item.description: (Genesis 37-41) President Gordon B. Hinckley teaches to hold the God's standards high and be an example to the world.

item.title: Many Esaus
item.description: (Genesis 25:24-34) Elder Oaks teaches to seek spiritual things before worldly things.

item.title: Thousands of Millions
item.description: (Genesis 24:1-4,60) A video teaching that the choices we make in this life can affect the generations to come.

item.title: Gliding Naively through Life
item.description: (Genesis 22:1-14) Elder Maxwell teaches that we need to experience challenges in our lives.

item.title: Covenants and Ordinances
item.description: (Genesis 17:1-9) Elder Nelson teaches about the importance of covenants.

item.title: Abraham
item.description: (Genesis 17) The Lord appears to Abraham and covenants with him.

item.title: Things of the World
item.description: (Genesis 13:1-13) Elder Scott teaches to eliminate distractions from our lives.

item.title: The Abrahamic Covenant
item.description: (Genesis 12:1-3; Abraham 2:9-11) One family shows love and service to another less fortunate family.

item.title: Deliverance of Abraham
item.description: (Abraham 1:1-20) The Lord hears the prayer of Abraham and delivers him from his enemies.

item.title: Generous Fast Offerings
item.description: (Abraham 1:1-20) Elder Wirthlin encourages church members to give generous fast offerings.

item.title: Books of Remembrance
item.description: (Moses 6:5) President Kimball speaks on the importance of journals.

item.title: Are We Our Brother's Keeper?
item.description: (Moses 5:32-34) Elder Dallin H. Oaks explains why we must be our brother's keeper.

item.title: Salvation through Christ
item.description: (Moses 4:14-25) President Benson teaches that salvation is only through Christ.

item.title: Evidence of Creation
item.description: (Moses 2:26-31) Elder Ballard teaches that there is evidence of the creation all around us.

item.title: Christ the Creator
item.description: (Moses 2:1) Elder Maxwell testifies that Christ is the creator of our world and our savior.

item.title: Gods Work and Glory
item.description: (Moses 1:39) A video explains the importance of symbols and why they are used in the scriptures.

item.title: I've Got to Find Out Who I Am
item.description: (Moses 1:10-22) A song about finding out who we are.

item.title: A Child of God
item.description: (Moses 1:1-22) Elder Oaks teaches that we are all children of God.

item.title: God Has Held You in Reserve
item.description: (Abraham 3:22-28) Elder Marvin J. Ashton teaches about the last generation of righteous church members.

item.title: Children of Israel
item.description: Primary children talk about their faith and the gospel.

item.title: Many Plain and Precious Things
item.description: A video explaining the importance of the Joseph Smith translation of the bible.

item.title: Time Capsule
item.description: Seminary students reflect their opinions on the Old Testament and show their excitement to study it.

item.title: The Importance of the Old Testament
item.description: President Packer lists the doctrines and principles taught in the Old Testament.

item.title: The Atonement
item.description: (Moses 5:5-9) A video explaining the atonement and our potential.

item.title: Courage-2 Timothy 1:7
item.description: How do you find the courage to kick cancer, fight for your marriage, or defend your beliefs? Remember these three gifts from God. #courage

item.title: Mountains to Climb–Dieter F. Uchtdorf
item.description: We all have mountains to climb. To make it to the top, never give up. #Patience

item.title: Unsinkable-Neal A. Maxwell
item.description: Unsinkable. #patience

item.title: Pray Always-David A. Bednar
item.description: It's important to create each day spiritually first.

item.title: His Timetable-Robert C. Oaks
item.description: His children. His plan. His timetable. #Patience

item.title: A Lesson in Spelling–Dieter F. Uchtdorf
item.description: A lesson in spelling from an apostle of God.#LoveOneAnother

item.title: Teaching By Faith-Robert D. Hales
item.description: Children need to know God and Jesus Christ will always love them and answer their prayers. This knowledge will bring them abiding strength.

item.title: To Love and To Serve-Spencer W. Kimball
item.description: Watch this message, then answer this question: Who has God given to you to love? #LoveOneAnother

item.title: Baby Steps-Joseph B. Wirthlin
item.description: Celebrate the small steps. #Patience

item.title: Use Your Heart-Bruce D. Porter
item.description: Make prayer more than a routine check on a list. Use your heart. #Patience

item.title: Supernal Gift of Prayer-Richard G. Scott
item.description: No hour too late. No worry too small. No one too unworthy. #Prayer

item.description: Unsinkable. #patience

item.title: Reaching Out Through Love
item.description: When a young man is tasked with inviting his neighbor and peer to church, he learns it takes more than one try to have success.

item.title: Reaching Out Through Love
item.description: When a young man is tasked with inviting his neighbor and peer to church, he learns it takes more than one try to have success.

item.description: When a young man is tasked with inviting his neighbor and peer to church, he learns it takes more than one try to have success.
